DataModel

Class Member

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataModel.AbstractPerson
      • DataModel.Member
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObserverPattern.IObserver, ObserverPattern.ISubject

    public class Member
extends AbstractPerson
implements ObserverPattern.ISubject, ObserverPattern.IObserver
    This class represents a Member of the LETS System.

      java.lang.String contactNo,
      Address defaultAdd,
      java.lang.String isActive)
        Default constructor used to associate the appropriate information with the appropriate variables.
        Parameters:
        memberID - - int value being the unique ID of the Member.
        fName - - String value being the forename of the Member.
        sName - - String value being the surname of the Member.
        dOB - - Date value being the date of borth of the Member.
        email - - String value being the email address of the Member.
        contactNo - - String value being the contact number of the Member.
        defaultAdd - - Address value being the address of the Member.
        isActive - - String value showing the status of the Member (active or inactive).
